txt.en: 'You were able to find some dried kingsfoil? By the kings of old, you have saved my hide! I will bring it to that Aragorn directly.'
DNT bring the dried athelas to bergil

'What a bind I am! I found that hooded Aragorn a few dried leaves of kingsfoil or, what does he call it, athelas? Well, now he wants more. The old man who gave me those leaves has not any more. Will you help me? Somewhere about here, someone must have a few more dried leaves!'
Aragorn has tasked Bergil with finding enough athelas, also known as kingsfoil, to treat every soldier afflicted with the Black Shadow.
Ask people in Minas Tirith for any dried kingsfoil leaves they may have.
Bring the dried kingsfoil you have found back to Bergil, outside of the Houses of Healing on the Sixth Circle of Minas Tirith.
'Why yes, I've got some. Here you are.'
'If it's for those poor wounded men, then take it.'
'Kingsfoil? Why yes. How did you know?'
'Let me see. Yes, I think I have some kingsfoil laying about.'
'Kingsfoil? Yes, I have some leaves I can spare.'
DNT it's dried, but it will still do!
'To help the wounded? Here, take this.'
'That's curious. I just happen to have some kingsfoil with me right here!'
